Welcome to Polemarch’s documentation!¶

Polemarch is service for orchestration infrastructure by ansible. Simply WEB gui for orchestration infrastructure by ansible playbooks.

You could find latest releases there. Source code you could find in official repository.

Contact to us on any questions or report bugs.
